code: import React,{createContext,useState,useEffect}from'react';import{getBudgets}from'../api/budgetApi';export const BudgetContext=createContext();const BudgetProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[budgets,setBudgets]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchBudgets=async()=>{try{const response=await getBudgets();setBudgets(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching budgets',error);}};fetchBudgets();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(BudgetContext.Provider,{value:{budgets}},children);};export default BudgetProvider;
